languages.text: "Меня сломали. Когда друкари напали на Даргонус, меня схватили и пытали. Это длилось целую вечность, а потом они прекратили, и я понял, что прошла лишь минута. Время в их руках пластично, как и чужие тела".

"They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."
languages.original_text: "Меня сломали. Когда друкари напали на Даргонус, меня схватили и пытали. Это длилось целую вечность, а потом они прекратили, и я понял, что прошла лишь минута. Время в их руках пластично, как и чужие тела".

traits.locale_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realized that only a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

"They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

languages.text: 「俺らは彼らの手によって壊れてしまった。デュカーリがダルゴナスを攻撃したとき、俺は捕らえられ拷問を受けた。それは永遠に続いたが、やがてやっと終わった。実はまだたったの1分しか経っていないことに俺は気づいた。彼らは他人の体と同じように、時間を自由に操ることができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「俺らは彼らの手によって壊れてしまった。デュカーリがダルゴナスを攻撃したとき、俺は捕らえられ拷問を受けた。それは永遠に続いたが、やがてやっと終わった。実はまだたったの1分しか経っていないことに俺は気づいた。彼らは他人の体と同じように、時間を自由に操ることができるのだ」

languages.text: “他们摧毁了我的心智。那些黑暗灵族袭击达戈努斯的时候，他们把我抓了起来，用尽手段折磨我。我被折磨了很久很久，之后他们住了手，可那个时候我才意识到，折磨仅仅持续了一分钟。落在他们手中，就好像连时间的流动都不正常了一样。”
languages.original_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

traits.locale_text: “他们摧毁了我的心智。那些黑暗灵族袭击达戈努斯的时候，他们把我抓了起来，用尽手段折磨我。我被折磨了很久很久，之后他们住了手，可那个时候我才意识到，折磨仅仅持续了一分钟。落在他们手中，就好像连时间的流动都不正常了一样。”

languages.text: «Me quebraron. Cuando los Drukhari atacaron Dargonus, me capturaron y me torturaron. Duró una eternidad, pero, cuando pararon, comprendí que solo había pasado un minuto. El tiempo en sus manos es tan maleable como los cuerpos de los humanos».
languages.original_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Me quebraron. Cuando los Drukhari atacaron Dargonus, me capturaron y me torturaron. Duró una eternidad, pero, cuando pararon, comprendí que solo había pasado un minuto. El tiempo en sus manos es tan maleable como los cuerpos de los humanos».

languages.text: "Sie haben mich gebrochen. Als die Drukhari Dargonus angegriffen haben, wurde ich verschleppt und gefoltert. Es hat eine Ewigkeit gedauert, und dann haben sie aufgehört und ich habe erkannt, dass kaum eine Minute vergangen war. Die Zeit ist in ihren Händen so formbar wie die Körper anderer Leute."
languages.original_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben mich gebrochen. Als die Drukhari Dargonus angegriffen haben, wurde ich verschleppt und gefoltert. Es hat eine Ewigkeit gedauert, und dann haben sie aufgehört und ich habe erkannt, dass kaum eine Minute vergangen war. Die Zeit ist in ihren Händen so formbar wie die Körper anderer Leute."

languages.text: « Ils m'ont brisé. Quand les Drukharis ont attaqué Dargonus, j'ai été capturé et torturé. Ça a duré une éternité, et quand ils ont arrêté, je me suis rendu compte que ça n'avait duré qu'une minute à peine. Entre leurs mains, le temps est aussi malléable que nos corps. »
languages.original_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Ils m'ont brisé. Quand les Drukharis ont attaqué Dargonus, j'ai été capturé et torturé. Ça a duré une éternité, et quand ils ont arrêté, je me suis rendu compte que ça n'avait duré qu'une minute à peine. Entre leurs mains, le temps est aussi malléable que nos corps. »

languages.text: "Bana her şeyi anlattırdılar. Drukhari, Dargonus'a saldırdığında kaçırıldım ve işkence gördüm. Sonsuza dek sürmüş gibi geldi ama durduklarında yalnızca bir dakika geçtiğini fark ettim. Zaman ellerindeyken onu tıpkı diğerlerinin bedenleri gibi şekillendirebiliyorlar."
languages.original_text: "They broke me. When the Drukhari attacked Dargonus, I was captured and tortured. It lasted an eternity, and then they stopped and I realised that merely a minute had passed. The time in their hands is as malleable as other people's bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Bana her şeyi anlattırdılar. Drukhari, Dargonus'a saldırdığında kaçırıldım ve işkence gördüm. Sonsuza dek sürmüş gibi geldi ama durduklarında yalnızca bir dakika geçtiğini fark ettim. Zaman ellerindeyken onu tıpkı diğerlerinin bedenleri gibi şekillendirebiliyorlar."
